title: Clarification regarding the Snowdown Chests
body: What exactly are the potential drops within the Snowdown Chests (for example, the current one is "Frozen Fiends Snowdown Chest")?  I could not find an answer in the FAQ section or anywhere obvious on the boards despite a quick search.

replies.body: Per the [Snowdown Chest](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/236357867) guide, it looks like the Frozen Fiend chest is specially themed with icy shards in mind!  Good luck!
seems weird that arctic ops varus isn't on that list.
Alright, I tried one out.  I got a Tundra Fizz shard and some sweets.  Thanks for the replies!

Not real clear but clicking through the images and the FAQ on http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/snowdown-2016

The Frozen Fiends is "themed" skin shards, assume that is snowdown theme, plus 3 sweets. The winter chest is a hextech chest but also has a sweet in it.
